overview:
Financial Services and Payments Industry Executive

Hands-on executive-level consulting services to:

  • Financial Institutions
  • Card Associations
  • Networks
  • Processors
  • ISO/MSP/TPP’s
  • PSP’s/Payment Facilitators
  • E-money and Prepaid Card Issuers
  • Payment Institutions
  • Large corporates
  • Venture Capital and Private Equity investors in the Payments space

Primary focus in the area of Payments (Issuing, Acquiring, Processing, Regulatory matters).

Leverage years of Sr. Exec experience with leading Payments Providers to assist clients in speeding time to market, gain specific industry knowledge, build sponsorship relationships, complete end to end M&A transaction support, outsourced processing projects or conversions.
